pageContext.title: Goldings - IPA Is Dead
pageContext.description: This is East Kent Goldings re- invented and re-imagined and shows just what can be done with English hops if you use enough of them. In this amped up Goldings reincarnation expect to be slammed with floral lavender, a fruity riot of blackberries and spiced pears, bubblegum, plums and the illusion of thyme.
pageContext.author: Matt Ball <GeordieMatt>
